In the library, you get two [icon_greatwork_writing] masterpiece book slots. In ancient times, ICON_TECHBOOOSTED is triggered in text, machinery and medieval times.

Engineer

Replace the industrial area. [Icon_amenities] Increase the comfort of 1 and get the [icon_science] science as much as the adjacent boas of this earth. It also gives you a +1 charm to your surrounding tiles.
C&C
Replace special operations troops. [ICON_STRENGTH] melee combat power and [icon_ranged] The ranged combat power is 10 higher and you earn +100% of your experience.

Chairman Rio, it doesn't matter if this world defines you as evil. Defeat the enemy spies and design the future under the cold judgment and protection of the big world. Knowledge of your computer and robotics will help you.
If you tell me what your capital is, let's invite us to our Millennium Tower.
Good. It is extremely reasonable to prepare for the threat of color together.
You are not worth it yet.
I don't have a lot of friends. But I don't suggest friendship with you.
It's a wise choice.
It's not time yet. I need a careful review.
Welcome your trade delegation. They will be honored.
I can't get your delegation now.
I sent a trade delegation. Check out the avant -garde model you presented
Truth is generally the best evidence of slander.
I don't like the things you have done so far. What do friends think about this information? (I blame you).
I'm Tsukatsuki Rio, who chases the stars, hoping for the solution of the millennium. It's an honor to meet.
It's an honor to meet you. Do it to be formally greeted.
Reasonable.
What do you want?
Reasonable.
Your decision is not reasonable. Let me be interested in information.
Our alliance is a reasonable judgment. Will you be together?
Peace is a reasonable judgment.
Even if you calculate and consider all variables, the probability of achieving a goal is more than 99%. All the contrast is already over. In this situation, peace is not reasonable.
No more war is productive.
good.
I'll review it.
Our army wants permission to pass your land. Of course peaceful.
Your military action is in front of the door of my house. Do I look like a blind man?
You'll regret not reasonable choices.
You'll taste the technology of Millennium.
Rio has been impressed with your information.
Rio was disappointed with your information.
I can't do anything now for the coming color
Get this irrational proposal in front of my eyes.
Reasonable.
Seminar Clerk Ushio Noah, your record provided inspiration to great writers. Collect their masterpieces. Your masterpieces stored in the library will gather visitors from all over the world.
Let me tell you the way to our capital. Please answer me too.
The record is a bit difficult ... It's not enough to say good.
I think there is a lack of records to have a friendly relationship.
We are pleased with the gift you provided. I will remember your kindness.
I don't get a gift that doesn't know the purpose of the senter.
I sent a mission. Paper and ink together.
under?
I will overpower it quickly.
This is the secretary of the seminar, Ushio Noah. I would like to ask you. [Newline] ...... In many ways.
great.
What did you come?
It's reasonable. I can't be sure, but ... I might have grown a little bit more than before.
Be more faithful so that you can't be forgotten because it is not recorded.
Millennium is strong. If we are together, it will be stronger.
I might have been a little overwhelming ...
Even if I hide, I can't run away in my record!
This war is only hindered by us. Withdraw the army together.
Welcome the exchange and trade of profits to be gained from the opening of the border.
I can't allow it now.
I can't get an untrusted adult.
No more access is unacceptable.
Hey ... this is interesting.
Excuse me for a moment, start a record.
I'm glad you help me with my knowledge.
Huh. If you have a better opinion, please.
Oh, don't worry. I'm just observing.
Would you like to visit our nearby city?
Noah has been impressed with your culture.
Noah was disappointed with your culture.
This is a pity ... I might have been a little overwhelming ...
This is a pity ... I might have been a little overwhelming ...
Even if you look at it, you can't accept this proposal.
It's a reasonable choice.

Accounting the grim calculations, you have led the right to the Millennium, which could have been bankrupt. Get the golden age of prosperity and trade with knowledge of your economy. Millennium's overwhelming financial power Everyone will cheer and gather under your flag.
Let me tell you the way to our capital. Please answer me too.
Why is it ...? It's an indescribable sense, but ... I don't hate it.
Please consume a planned consumption. Friendship with a waste is dangerous.
Starting in mathematics is important. Shall we start?
This is ... it will be a lot of plus!
It's not time now. Because there is something like Taesan!
We are pleased with the gift you provided. I will remember your kindness.
We do not receive a gift that does not know the purpose of the senter.
If you are okay ... Would you like to accept my sports card?
under?
I don't like this expression, but it's the lowest.
The condition is satisfied. We will define this moment as a relationship and prove it.
Welcome to Millennium! I've prepared hard for today!
great.
What did you come?
It's great. Impulse is prohibited! Consumption should be planned.
If you are a leader, please consume a planned consumption. You're not a child who receives a pocket money and spends it.
Millennium is strong. If we are together, it will be stronger.
Why is it ...? It's an indescribable sense, but ... I don't hate it.
Rationale and reason are ruthless. I will prove victory.
This war is only hindered by us. Withdraw the army together.
Welcome the exchange and trade of profits to be gained from the opening of the border.
I can't allow it now.

Current situation and conditions. Okay, this war won!
Yuuka has been impressed with your economic power.

The calculator ...
